General.Name: BasicNet S.p.A
General.Description: BasicNet S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the sports and casual clothing, footwear, and accessories sectors in Europe, the Americas, Asia, Oceania, the Middle East, and Africa. It engages in the development of the value of the brands; and distribution of products through a network of independent licensees. The company offers its products under the brand names Kappa, Robe di Kappa, K-Way, Superga, Briko, Jesus Jeans, Sabelt, and Sebago. It also sells its products online. BasicNet S.p.A. is headquartered in Turin, Italy.
General.Address: Largo Maurizio Vitale 1, Turin, TO, Italy, 10152
